attributes.action: All professional drivers have a vocational driving  license.
attributes.additional_details: The driving license has not changed in the last 50 years ! With all the speed cameras and stealth speed camera vans on the road it is unfair on us ladies and gentlemen driving vehicles for a living and doing thousands of miles a year to have the same conditions as someone who just drives 10 miles a week around town.
attributes.background: Give all professional drivers a separate vocational license.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want the Government to create a new driving licence for professional drivers, but it's not clear how you want this to differ from a standard driving licence.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
